sentences.en: At night I would smuggle him into my bed - place, and we would whisper together.
sentences.cn: 每到夜晚我便偷偷把他带入卧铺.我们两人在房内轻声交谈.

sentences.en: Bolivia has arrested three other police officers suspected of helping him smuggle cocaine to the US.
sentences.cn: 玻利维亚还逮捕了其他三名涉嫌帮助他向美国走私可卡因的警察。

sentences.en: Can't you smuggle a gas bomb onto one of your rival hives?
sentences.cn: 你们不能把一枚毒气弹头偷运进敌对的母舰中去么?

sentences.en: Elsewhere, legal shipments of ivory have been used to smuggle illegal ivory.
sentences.cn: 在其它地区, 合法的象牙出货船被用来走私非法象牙.

sentences.en: Friends managed to smuggle him secretly out of the country.
sentences.cn: 朋友们想方设法将他秘密送出国了.

sentences.en: Having got a reliable report a passenger who was to smuggle drugs.
sentences.cn: 在得到可靠的情报,知道有人将走私毒品之后.

sentences.en: How can they smuggle the precious packet past the guards?
sentences.cn: 他们何以能偷带着贵重的包裹走过警卫人员而不被发现 呢 ?

sentences.en: Is it difficult to smuggle tools into that prison?
sentences.cn: 要把工具偷偷带进那监狱很困难 吗 ?

sentences.en: It is a serious crime to smuggle drugs into Britain.
sentences.cn: 私运毒品入英国是严重罪行.

sentences.en: It's a serious crime to smuggle an animal into Britain.
sentences.cn: 走私动物到英国是严重的违法行为.

sentences.en: It's impossible to smuggle two more prisoners out of the prison camp.
sentences.cn: 再从战俘营里偷偷带出两名战俘是不可能的.

sentences.en: Many can smuggle, trade, bribe, and grow food on individual plots.
sentences.cn: 许多人可以走私 、 贸易 、 贿赂或在小块个人的土地上种植谷物.

sentences.en: My message is "If you try to smuggle drugs you are stupid."
sentences.cn: 我的讯息是，“你若企图走私毒品，那是犯傻。”

sentences.en: Ogden says the Justice Department will also investigate and prosecute those who smuggle guns and cash into Mexico.
sentences.cn: 他说，司法部还将调查和起诉那些向墨西哥走私枪支和现金的人。

sentences.en: People who smuggle contraband goods will be punished by the law.
sentences.cn: 偷运违禁物品的行为,要受到法律的制裁.

sentences.en: Rob tried to smuggle his puppy into the house.
sentences.cn: 罗伯想偷偷把他的小狗带进屋去.

sentences.en: The guns were smuggled across the border.
sentences.cn: 这些枪被偷运过境。

sentences.en: They have to smuggle the computer disk into the country.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不将计算机磁盘偷运进该国.

sentences.en: We are occasionally able to smuggle a razor blade into a prisoner's cell.
sentences.cn: 我们有时会把一片剃须刀片偷偷地送到牢房里去.

sentences.en: With no neighbouring countries and rigid customs controls at ports and airports, it will be difficult for anyone to smuggle in contraband cigarettes.
sentences.cn: 没有邻国，加之在海港和空港实行严格的海关监管，不管是谁，走私禁运品香烟都将是非常困难的事。

words.tran_cn: 走私者；走私犯；[法] 走私船

trans.tran_en: to take something or someone illegally from one country to another
to take something or someone illegally from one country to another

trans.tran_cn: 偷运，私运，走私，不按规章地偷带（人或物）
trans.tran_en: to take something or someone illegally from one country to another
